gobblin.http

Class DefaultHttpClientConfigurator

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.http.DefaultHttpClientConfigurator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HttpClientConfigurator

    @Alias(value="default")
public class DefaultHttpClientConfigurator
extends Object
implements HttpClientConfigurator
    Default implementation that uses the following properties to configure an HttpClient.
    • PROXY_HOSTPORT_KEY
    • PROXY_URL_KEY
    • PROXY_PORT_KEY

      static String PROXY_URL_KEY
      The hostname of the HTTP proxy to use
